channel.title: Comedy4RS---RSMV PROJECT. SIGN UP NOW
channel.description:
Project Comedy4RS
Ever heard of , TehNoobShow or TehBumShow. Well incase you have not heard about them. Well these are famous personalities that make youtube videos related to runescape , they are mainly for comedy purposes such as making fun of the game or just goofing around saying funny & weird stuff. Well I'v been folowing both these major internet/rs sensations for a while now. I'v been quite inspired by them , due to the fame they get and ofcourse respect. Well, i was just thinking about those people yesterday and i just got the feeling that i wanted to do a familiar series of comedy shows/drama on rs. And so i came here looking for people to help me.
Well, I need a few people to help me start this. But before i start listing the positions i'd also like to give the BASIC/NECESSARY Requirments to join this project.
+_+Must have a microphone+_+ +_+Must have a skype account ( if not just make one , so we can tawk )+_+ +_+Must play rs regularly.+_+ +_+Should be a nice person. (a nice accent/voice would be awsome!)+_+ +_+Must add me on MSN- Usmanahmad7880@live.com+_+
Now for the Positions i need to be filled. |+|+|CameraMan-Blayze (needs to have a good camera not unregistered hyper cam writen on top of the video it looks quite unprofessional)|+|+|
|+|+|Editor-EMPTY(needs to have sony vegas and good editing skills no first timers allowed)|+|+|
|+|+|Actors-ME,Blayz,EMPTY,EMPTY,EMPTY (need to have a good rs character with good costume , good voice)|+|+|
Thank you for reading please email/IM me if you want to take part!

@Usyman wrote:

Project Comedy4RS

Ever heard of , TehNoobShow or TehBumShow. Well incase you have not heard about them. Well these are famous personalities that make youtube videos related to runescape , they are mainly for comedy purposes such as making fun of the game or just goofing around saying funny & weird stuff. Well I’v been folowing both these major internet/rs sensations for a while now. I’v been quite inspired by them , due to the fame they get and ofcourse respect.
